articles.description: European Ryder Cup stars make significant moves early on the second day of the 2025 Open - but they are unable to match former champion Brian Harman.
articles.title: The Open 2025: McIlroy, MacIntyre & Hatton chasing leader Harman

articles.description: Watch and follow live as world champions Spain face hosts Switzerland for a place in the semi-finals at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Spain vs Switzerland LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: Arsenal complete the signing of England winger Noni Madueke from Chelsea for an initial fee of £48.5m.
articles.title: Noni Madueke: Arsenal sign England winger from Chelsea for £48.5m

articles.description: Bryan Mbeumo has joined Manchester United to boost their firepower options but does Ruben Amorim still need to sign a striker?
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo transfer: Do Manchester United still need to sign a striker or can Rasmus Hojlund flourish?
The hottest favourites in 100 years, can Lions deliver on their promise?

articles.description: Will Laurent Bonadei stick with young centre-backs Alice Sombath and Thiniba Samoura for their quarter-final against Germany at Euro 2025?
articles.title: Euro 2025: Alice Sombath & Thiniba Samoura fill Wendie Renard gap

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk attempts to get in Daniel Dubois' head one final time by stepping ahead of the Briton and standing at the front of the stage during the weigh-in at BoxPark Wembley.
articles.title: Usyk vs Dubois 2: Oleksandr Usyk plays mind games with Daniel Dubois at weigh-in

articles.description: The pressure is on Scottie Scheffler to turn his halfway lead at Royal Portrush into a first Open win, says his closest challenger Matt Fitzpatrick.
articles.title: The Open 2025: Matt Fitzpatrick says pressure on Scottie Scheffler

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar reasserts his dominance of the Tour de France by claiming his fourth stage win of this year's Tour on Friday.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Pogacar wins time trial on stage 13 to stretch lead

articles.description: England's resilience, the impact of the 'super-subs' and a large slice of luck proved to be familiar traits in their penalty shootout win over Sweden.
articles.title: Euro 2025: Resilience, luck and subs - England's winning formula delivers
